Method Detail

registerReceiver

public BroadcastChannel registerReceiver(Receiver r,
                                         String channelName)
Adds the receiver as listener on a channel and returns the BroadcastChannel object that the receiver was added to. If a BroadcastChannel by that name was not found a new one is created.

Parameters:
r - The receiver.
channelName - Name of the receiver channel.
Returns:
The channel that the receiver was added to.

registerTransmitter

public BroadcastChannel registerTransmitter(Transmitter t,
                                            String channelName)
Registers the transmitter to a channel and returns the BroadcastChannel object that the transmitter was added to. If a BroadcastChannel by that name was not found a new one is created.

Parameters:
r - The receiver.
channelName - Name of the receiver channel.
Returns:
The channel that the receiver was added to.

removeTransmitter

public boolean removeTransmitter(Transmitter t)
Removes this transmitter from the list and removes its channel if it's deserted.

Returns:
true if the transmitter was actually removed.

removeReceiver

public boolean removeReceiver(Receiver r)
Removes this receiver from the list and removes its channel if it's deserted.

Returns:
true if the receiver was actually removed.

getChannelByName

public BroadcastChannel getChannelByName(String name,
                                         boolean create)
Finds a BroadcastChannel with the specified name. If the named channel doesn't exist and create is true, a new channel is created.

Parameters:
Channel - name
boolean - create
Returns:
a BroadcastChannel instance representing the named channel.

getBroadcastChannels

public Map<String,BroadcastChannel> getBroadcastChannels()
Returns:
All broadcast channels running on the server.

getCircuitWireless

public List<Wireless> getCircuitWireless(Circuit circuit)
Finds all Wireless objects (Receivers or Transmitters) that are associated with a circuit.

Parameters:
circuit - The circuit to match
Returns:
A list of Wireless objects that are associated with circuit.
